document_data.caption: A map showing Kerrigan's Court in the Adventurers' Quarter.
document_data.name: Kerrigan's Court
document_data.mainbody: '''Kerrigan's Court''' was a courtyard located in [[Waterdeep]] during the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].{{Cite interactive atlas|Adventurers' Quarter}}
document_data.Location: Kerrigan's Court was located in the central section of Waterdeep's [[Waterdeep/Southern Ward|Southern Ward]] within the [[Waterdeep/Adventurers' Quarter|Adventurers' Quarter]]. The court connected with [[Slop Street]] along the southern edge of the Adventurers' Quarter.
